DescriptionOfIncident: Nutrisport Ltd recalls various Nutrisport and Atlas protein products because of undeclared milk
RiskToConsumers: This product contains milk making it a possible health risk for anyone with an allergy or intolerance to milk or milk constituents.

DescriptionOfIncident: Quorn recalls a batch of its 2 Gluten Free Burgers packs because of undeclared gluten
RiskToConsumers: This product contains gluten making it a possible health risk for anyone with an allergy or intolerance to gluten.

DescriptionOfIncident: Bradbury & Son (Buxton) recalls Lo-Col because milk is not emphasised on the labelling
RiskToConsumers: This product contains milk making it a possible health risk for anyone with an allergy or intolerance to milk or milk constituents

DescriptionOfIncident: Asco Foods Ltd recalls Dee Thai Crispy Rolls ? Durian Flavour due to undeclared sesame
RiskToConsumers: This product contains sesame making it a possible health risk for anyone with an allergy to sesame.

DescriptionOfIncident: Sainsbury?s recalls ?by Sainsbury?s Coconut & Yogurt filled Breakfast Biscuits? and ?by Sainsbury?s Cocoa filled Breakfast Biscuits? due to undeclared sesame
RiskToConsumers: These products contain sesame making them a possible health risk for anyone with an allergy to sesame.

DescriptionOfIncident: (Updated) Bradbury & Son (Buxton) recalls Lo-Col because milk is not emphasised on the labelling
RiskToConsumers: This product contains milk making it a possible health risk for anyone with an allergy or intolerance to milk or milk constituents

DescriptionOfIncident: Co-op recalls its Hoisin Chicken Noodle Box due to undeclared milk
RiskToConsumers: These products contain milk making them a possible health risk for anyone with an allergy or intolerance to milk or milk constituents.

DescriptionOfIncident: Lidl Ireland recalls McEnnedy Peanut Flavoured Supersize Flips as allergens are not declared in English
RiskToConsumers: This product contains peanuts and may contain traces of nuts and gluten making it a possible health risk for anyone with an allergy to peanuts and/or nuts and/or an allergy or intolerance to gluten

DescriptionOfIncident: Star Distribution (UK) Ltd recalls its Cake Zone Muffins 4 pack Chunky Cherry and Double Chocolate Flavour because of incorrect allergen labelling
RiskToConsumers: This product contains egg, milk and wheat (gluten) making it a possible health risk for anyone with an allergy or intolerance to wheat or gluten, egg and/or milk or milk constituents.

DescriptionOfIncident: E H Booths recalls sandwiches due to incorrect allergen labelling
RiskToConsumers: This product contains rye and oats making it a possible health risk for anyone with an allergy to rye or oats.

DescriptionOfIncident: Clayton Park Bakery recalls various bakery products because they contain barley
RiskToConsumers: The products contain barley making them a possible health risk for anyone with an allergy or intolerance to barley or gluten.

DescriptionOfIncident: James Hall & Co recalls take-away sandwich rolls because they contain barley
RiskToConsumers: The products contain barley making them a possible health risk for anyone with an allergy or intolerance to barley or gluten.

DescriptionOfIncident: Clayton Park Bakery recalls various bakery products because they contain barley
RiskToConsumers: The products contain barley making them a possible health risk for anyone with an allergy or intolerance to barley or gluten.

DescriptionOfIncident: Lidl Ireland recalls Harvest Basket Potato Croquettes as allergens are not written in English
RiskToConsumers: This product contains wheat (gluten) and egg making it a possible health risk for anyone with an allergy or intolerance to egg, wheat or gluten.

DescriptionOfIncident: Crosse & Blackwell recalls its Green Vegetable & Kale Soup due to undeclared milk
RiskToConsumers: This product contains milk making it a possible health risk for anyone with an allergy or intolerance to milk or milk constituents.

DescriptionOfIncident: Fazila Foods Limited recalls two types of kebab rolls because of undeclared allergens
RiskToConsumers: These products contain milk and sulphites, making them a possible health risk for anyone with an allergy or intolerance to milk or milk constituents, and/or a sensitivity to sulphur dioxide and/or sulphites.

DescriptionOfIncident: Sainsbury?s recalls in store bakery all butter croissant due to undeclared almonds
RiskToConsumers: This product contains nuts making it a possible health risk for anyone with an allergy to nuts.

DescriptionOfIncident: Creme d?Or recalls assorted chocolates because they contain undeclared natural pistachio flavouring
RiskToConsumers: These products may contain pistachio making them a possible health risk for anyone with an allergy to nuts (pistachios).

DescriptionOfIncident: N J Marketing Ltd recalls Lemon Bonbons because of undeclared allergens
RiskToConsumers: This product contains soya & milk making it a possible health risk for anyone with an allergy to soya and an allergy or intolerance to milk or milk constituents.
